thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com
thread.title: sol

author: sol
title: sol
text:
In short, my mini cards came in with the text on the front way too small to read and I was devastated. I was thinking, the fault was on my side as MOO didn't do anything incorrectly, so there could slim chances that they will even allow returns or reprints.
Don't get me wrong, the texture and the touch of the cards were fantastic and so were the photos printed on the back. I online chatted with a CSR and she instantly offered me a reprint which was a big surprise. Not only that, they also tried to push for a closer delivery date when I called for a follow-up.
The overall experience was amazing though the mini cards do come with smaller than expected fonts. Just double check with a PDF proof to see the real-life size of the text before you pay.
I would definitely recommend MOO to all businesses and individuals out there who are looking for premium looking and touching promo materials!
